mapper.insert: insert into tb_girls ( _id, createdAt, publishedAt, `source`, url, used ) values ( #{_id}, #{createdAt}, #{publishedAt}, #{source}, #{url}, #{used} )

insert into tb_girls ( _id, createdAt, publishedAt, `source`, url, used ) values
( #{item._id}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.publishedAt}, #{item.source}, #{item.url}, #{item.used} )
mapper.select: select * from tb_girls where used=true order by `_id` desc limit #{start},#{size};
